name: Ext_R5_ClinicalImpression_changePattern
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ClinicalImpression.changePattern for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ClinicalImpression.changePattern from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ClinicalImpression|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Change in the status/pattern of a subject's condition since previously assessed, such as worsening, improving, or no change
element.definition: Change in the status/pattern of a subject's condition since previously assessed, such as worsening, improving, or no change.  It is a subjective assessment of the direction of the change.
element.comment: `ClinicalImpression.changePattern` has no related element in R4B:ClinicalImpression

element.short: Change in the status/pattern of a subject's condition since previously assessed, such as worsening, improving, or no change
element.definition: Change in the status/pattern of a subject's condition since previously assessed, such as worsening, improving, or no change.  It is a subjective assessment of the direction of the change.
element.comment: `ClinicalImpression.changePattern` has no related element in R4B:ClinicalImpression
